lu.uni.lassy.excalibur.examples.icrash.dev.java.environment.actors

Interface ActCoordinator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ActAuthenticated, JIntIsActor, java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActCoordinatorImpl

    public interface ActCoordinator
extends ActAuthenticated
    The Interface ActCoordinator that allows the client to access the server via RMI.

      • oeGetCrisisSet

        PtBoolean oeGetCrisisSet(EtCrisisStatus aEtCrisisStatus)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                         java.rmi.NotBoundException
        Requests a crisis to be sent to the coordinator with the same status as the one provided.
        Parameters:
        aEtCrisisStatus - The crises with this status type will be sent to the requesting actor
        Returns:
        The success of the method
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if the server is offline
        java.rmi.NotBoundException - Thrown if the server has not been bound correctly in RMI settings
